TriplePlay 1.8  Overview   Package   Class  Help

 PREV PACKAGE  NEXT PACKAGE          FRAMES    NO FRAMES DETAIL:   REMOVED |  ADDED |  CHANGED

Package tripleplay.ui

Removed Classes and Interfaces
ClickableTextWidget A text widget that provides button-like behavior.
ImageIcon Use Icons.image.
Scroller.Bar A horizontal or vertical scroll bar.
Scroller.BarRenderer Draws a scroll bar onto a surface.
TogglableTextWidget Extends the ClickableTextWidget with toggling behavior.
 

Added Classes and Interfaces
AbstractTextButton An abstract base class for buttons with text labels.
Behavior Controls the behavior of a widget (how it responds to pointer events).
Behavior.Capturing A click behavior that captures the pointer and optionally issues clicks based on some time based function.
Behavior.Click Implements clicking behavior.
Behavior.Ignore A behavior that ignores everything.
Behavior.RapidFire Captures the pointer and dispatches one click on press, a second after an initial delay and at regular intervals after that.
Behavior.Select Implements button-like behavior: selects the element when the pointer is in bounds, and deselects on release.
Behavior.Toggle Implements toggling behavior.
Behavior.Track Tracks the pressed position as an anchor and delegates to subclasses to update state based on anchor and drag position.
Behavior.Track.State Holds the necessary data for the currently active press.
Box A container that holds zero or one widget.
CapturedRoot A root that renders its layer into an image.
Composite A container with a fixed list of children, which client code must assume is immutable.
Container A shared base class for elements which contain other elements.
Container.Mutable A container that allows mutation (adding and removal) of its children.
Field.MaxLength Blocks keypresses for a native text field when the length is at a given maximum.
Field.Native Exposes protected field information required for native fields.
Field.Transformer For native text fields, transforms text during typing.
Field.Validator For native text fields, decides whether to block a keypress based on the proposed content of the field.
IconEffect Used to apply effects to an Icon.
Icons.Loader An icon that supports asynchronous images.
Icons.Preloaded A simple icon that uses an {@code Image} to get its dimensions and a simple image layer when rendered.
ImageButton A button that uses images for its different states.
MenuHost.TriggerPoint Defines how to obtain the point on a trigger where a menu popup originates.
Scroller.BarType Handles creating the scroll bars.
Scroller.Bars Handles the appearance and animation of scroll bars.
Scroller.Range A range along an axis for representing scroll bars.
Scroller.TouchBars Plain rectangle scroll bars that fade out, ideal for drag scrolling.
Style.GradientType Defines different types of gradient fills.
Style.GradientTypeStyle  
 

Changed Classes and Interfaces
Background A background is responsible for rendering a border and a fill.
Button A button that displays text, or an icon, or both.
CheckBox Displays a checkbox which can be toggled.
Clickable Implemented by Elements that can be clicked.
Constraints.TextConstraint A special layout constraint used by TextWidgets which adjusts only the text size of the widget, leaving the remaining dimensions (icon, insets, etc.) unmodified.
Element The root of the interface element hierarchy.
Elements Contains other elements and lays them out according to a layout policy.
Field Displays text which can be edited via the Keyboard.getText popup.
Icons Contains icon related utility classes and methods, mostly basic icon factories.
Interface The main class that integrates the Triple Play UI with a PlayN game.
Layout Defines the interface to layouts, which implement a particular layout policy.
Layout.Constraint An abstract base class for all layout constraints.
LongPressButton A button that supports an action on a "long press".
MenuHost Provides a context for popping up a menu.
MenuHost.Pop An event type for triggering a menu popup.
MenuItem An item in a menu.
Root The root of a display hierarchy.
Scroller A composite element that manages horizontal and vertical scrolling of a single content element.
Selector Maintains a single selected item among a specified set of {@code Element} instances.
Slider Displays a bar and a thumb that can be slid along the bar, representing a floating point value between some minimum and maximum.
Style Defines style properties for interface elements.
Style.TextEffectStyle Used to provide concise TextEffect style declarations.
Tabs A {@code Composite} that implements tabbing.
Tabs.Tab Represents a tab: button and content.
ToggleButton A toggle button that displays text, or an icon, or both.
Widget The base class for all user interface widgets.
